entry.title: Winning at Code
entry.summary: So what does it take to be successful in the field of programming? I’m not really sure, heh. You’ll probably first need to be proficient in whatever primary language you’re learning. After that? Well, I’ve made a chart to illustrate the process: 1...

entry.title: The Amateur Programmer
entry.summary: I started my coding journey back in the MySpace days, learning HTML and CSS as a hobby. Several bespoke pages later, I had a solid understanding of website customization. Now I’m well on my way to being a back-end ninja, wrapping my head around Ruby...
